message.intro: Poké Corpus is a tool that allows you to search text and dialogue from the Pokémon games.
message.filters: First, select the games and languages that you would like to search within.
message.search: Next, enter a word or phrase in the search box and hit "Search".
message.results: Queries are run locally on your device. Matching results will appear in the lower window.
message.more: For additional information about Poké Corpus, please visit <Link>this page</Link>.
message.done: To view this tutorial again later, click the "Tutorial" link in the footer of the page.
